author: wjmelements
content:
Outdated EIP, but it's not urgent to clear storage, and users of the reincarnation pattern don't use storage generally, so rather than clearing eagerly, can make a gas bounty. https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2936
Given refund removal, an alternative mechanism would be for a block producer to be able to identify ghost storage to unlock extra gas limit for their block (limited or diminishing), or they could receive some portion of the otherwise-burned base fee. The identifications could be a special "transaction" in the payload, or a section of the header.
